module.name: ghORM

element.name: TghModel
element.descr: This is the base class that all ghORM classes should extend from to make use of ORM functionality in ghORM

module.short: Object Relational Mapping unit built on top of Greyhound project
module.descr: The idea is to automate saving and loading of published properties. Note that the API is not yet stable, it might change in the future without notice

element.name: TghModel.GetTable
element.short: Get table instance of the current model

element.name: TghModel.Create
element.short: Create a new or load an existing instance of a table row
element.descr:
If no ID parameter is given, then an ID will be automatically assigned (and is not modifiable). Otherwise, it will try to load a row with the given ID.
If an ID parameter is given, then the effect is the same as calling Create without parameter, followed by calling Load with the given ID.
element.errors: If there's no row having the given ID, an exception will be raised

element.name: TghModel.Save
element.short: Save all published properties into the permanent storage

element.name: TghModel.Load
element.short: Load an existing instance of a table row
element.errors: If there's no row having the given ID, an exception will be raised

element.name: TghModel.ID
element.descr: This ID uniquely identifies the row and it can't be modified through this property. Use Load method to change the current instance to different row.

element.name: RegisterClass
element.short: Register a TghModel descendant to be recognized by ghORM system

element.name: SetConnection
element.short: Set connection properties to be used by ghORM

element.name: SetConnection.ABroker
element.short: Type of connection broker, refer to Greyhound for a complete list

element.name: SetConnection.ADBName
element.descr: Depending on the broker type, it can be a filename or a database name

element.name: RegisterClass.AClass
element.short: TghModel descendant class to be registered

element.name: RegisterClass.AName
element.descr: If no such a parameter is given, then it will be deduced automatically from the class name by removing the initial 'T'. Thus, TUsers will map to 'users' table.
element.short: Optional parameter that maps the class and the table name.

element.name: TghModel.Load.AID
element.short: ID of the row to load data from

element.name: TghModel.Create.AID
element.short: ID of the row to load data from
